mapper.insert:
insert into aims_assets (id, company_id, gzh_num, cch_num, shb_name, shb_brand, shb_spec, fy_type, unit, price, chsh_code, chsh_name, xq_department, she_area, shb_weight, shb_sn, project, segment, gzh_name, shb_status, building, floor, xianti, po_num, ly_emp, ly_emp_name, dh_time, jy_time, yj_cycle, note ) values
(#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gzhNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cchNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shbBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shbSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chshCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chshName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xqDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sheArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shbWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shbSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{segment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gzhName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shbStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{building,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xianti,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{poNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lyEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lyEmpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dhTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yjCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
